title: Saratoga National Historical Park: Donate
body: Donate       If you would like to make a donation to Saratoga National Historical Park and help support our efforts to spread the word about the "most important battle of the last 1000 years," you can do so in one of two ways.  Checks made out to "National Park Service" can be sent to: Park Superintendent, Saratoga National Historical Park, 648 Route 32, Stillwater, NY 12170 Checks made out to "Friends of Saratoga Battlefield" can be sent to: Friends of Saratoga Battlefield, 648 Route 32, Stillwater, NY 12170. Online donations may be made through Friends of Saratoga Battlefield by going to their website.
